Mercy magnified on a penitent prodigal, or, A brief discourse wherein Christs parable of the lost son found is opened and applied as it was delivered in sundry sermons / by Samuel Willard ... Willard, Samuel, 1640-1707.
[6], 391, [1] p.
Printed by Samuel Green for Samuel Philips, and are to be sold at his shop ..., Boston in New-England : 1684.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
